Load libraries 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


Read in the data to get staffing levels 
```{r}
fid15 = read_tsv("./fid15.tsv")
fid15 %>% group_by(jtid, hid) %>% summarise(count = n()) %>% group_by(jtid) %>% summarise(count = n())
```

Same thing for the other facility 
```{r}
fid19 = read_tsv("./fid19.tsv")
fid19 %>% group_by(jtid, hid) %>% summarise(count = n()) %>% group_by(jtid) %>% summarise(count = n())
```
